amendment.description: To establish and fund a new Federal-State partnership to expand access to high-quality preschool programs for children from low- and moderate-income families, offset with revenue from closing loopholes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 951 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 119.

action.text: Amendment SA 951 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S1873-1874; text: CR S1873-1874) To establish and fund a new Federal-State partnership to expand access to high-quality preschool programs for children from low- and moderate-income families, offset with revenue from closing loopholes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 951 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 119.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 951 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 119.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 951 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Murray.
